item.description:
Â 

Bring your friendly dog to our Valentine's mutt mix & mingle. When it's too cold to play outside, you can bring your dogs to an indoor play session to help cure that cabin fever. We have an indoor playroom specially designed for doggy play dates. All friendly dogs welcome to romp. All breeds of dogs welcome. Fill your dog's day with energy-burning fun and relaxation among friends. This meet-up is FREE. Please make sure your pet is up to date on Rabies, Distemper, and Bordetella because they will be playing with other dogs. Refreshments for dogs and humans. Come Play!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Mutt Mix & Mingle Meet-up
